entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test project for .NET 7 Android project not working. #29172
  • Incorrect path packaging native libraries whenever file name contains multiple dots #29170
  • Issues switching from .NET SDK 6.0.x to 7.0.100 #29164
  • Hot Reload just doesn't work. #29163

Closed

  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.ReferenceExeTests.ReferencedExeCanRunWhenPublishedWithTrimming(referenceExeInCode: False) #29008
  • dotnet new returns wrong exit code when required parameter is not specified with dotnet sdk 7 #29157
    7.0.1xx
  • [release/7.0.2xx] System.NullReferenceException when running dotnet watch run #29085

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove tmp from the default includes for tests #29180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
    Area-dotnet new
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Make sure the test theories go into different folders. #29154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2051302 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce MSBuild task frontend for the Roslyn-based GenAPI #29146
    Area-GenAPI
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29094
    Area-Infrastructure
